title: Mastering Product Edit & Delete Operations
author: Ekobol Product Team
image_alt: Product catalog management interface with bulk editing tools
image_caption: Manage thousands of products with ease from a single dashboard.
p1: Ekobol allows you to edit and manage product listings across all connected marketplaces from one centralized location. Master bulk operations, version history, and safe deletion workflows to maintain a clean, profitable catalog.
p2: For individual product updates and refinements.
li2_text: Find product using search or filters
li3_text: Click 'Edit' icon (pencil) next to product name
li4_text: Edit form opens with all current data pre-filled
li6_text: Base price, Compare-at price, Cost per item, Profit margin (auto-calculated)
li7_text: Stock quantity, Track inventory (yes/no), Low stock threshold
li8_text: Rich text editor or AI-generated content
li9_text: Upload new, reorder, delete, AI background removal
li10_text: Size, Color, Material options with separate SKU/price/stock
li11_text: Meta title, Meta description, URL handle
li12_text: Select which marketplaces to publish to
li13_text: Select all products matching current filter
li15_text: Select by SKU range (SKU-1000 to SKU-2000)
li16_text: Import CSV with SKUs to update
p4: Never lose data with automatic version control.
li17_text: Every edit creates a version snapshot
li18_text: View full edit history (who changed what, when)
li25_text: Restore with one click if needed
warn_text: Deleting a product removes it from ALL connected marketplaces. Active orders for deleted products will still fulfill normally.
p6: Remove from listings without deleting data.
li31_text: Product saved but not published. Useful for products in preparation.
li32_text: Hide from active catalog but keep sales history. Useful for seasonal items.
li33_text: Mark as unavailable, auto-publishes when restocked.
p7: Create variations quickly from existing products.
li35_text: All fields copied except SKU (auto-generates new one)
li36_text: Modify duplicated product (e.g., change color variant)
li39_text: Products → Export → Select fields → Download CSV
p9: Find exactly which products need editing.
li47_text: Filter by: Category, Brand, Vendor, Tag, Price range, Stock level
li51_text: Admin: Full edit + delete. Manager: Edit only. Staff: View only.
li53_text: Track all edits with user, timestamp, before/after values.
li54_text: ✅ Always use 'Draft' status for products under development
li55_text: ✅ Bulk edit during low-traffic hours to avoid customer confusion
li56_text: ✅ Export backup CSV before major bulk operations
li57_text: ✅ Use tags for seasonal organization ('Black Friday 2025')
li58_text: ✅ Review version history weekly to catch unauthorized changes
p11: Ekobol's product management tools ensure you maintain a clean, profitable catalog while adapting to your business's ever-changing needs.
